Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $150. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I kindly invite you to accept this offer at the same value of $150, ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to ask. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
